mapper.select: select nf_no, n.pr_no, n.emp_no, nf_content, nf_date, n.status, e.emp_name, e.profile, p.pr_title from newsfeed n join project p on p.pr_no = n.pr_no join employee e on e.emp_no = n.emp_no where n.emp_no = #{empNo} and n.status = 'Y'
select pr_title ,pr_logo ,p.pr_no from project p join prmember pr on pr.pr_no = p.pr_no where pr.emp_no = #{empNo} and pr_enddate >= to_char(sysdate, 'mm/dd/yyyy')

select nf_no ,n.pr_no ,n.emp_no ,nf_content ,nf_date ,e.emp_name ,e.profile ,p.pr_title ,origin_name ,change_name from newsfeed n join project p on p.pr_no = n.pr_no join employee e on e.emp_no = n.emp_no left join attachment a on (n.nf_no = a.ref_no and ref_code = 'NF') where p.pr_no = #{prNo} and n.status = 'Y'

select nf_no ,n.pr_no ,n.emp_no ,nf_content ,nf_date ,e.emp_name ,e.profile ,p.pr_title from newsfeed n join project p on p.pr_no = n.pr_no join employee e on e.emp_no = n.emp_no where n.nf_no = #{nfNo}
mapper.insert: insert into newsfeed ( nf_no , nf_content , nf_date , pr_no , emp_no ) values ( seq_nfno.nextval , #{nfContent} , sysdate , #{prNo} , #{empNo} )

insert into attachment ( attachment_no , file_path , origin_name , change_name , ref_code , ref_no ) values ( seq_atno.nextval , #{filePath} , #{originName} , #{changeName} , 'NF' , seq_nfno.currval )
mapper.select: select attachment_no , origin_name , change_name , file_path , ref_no from attachment where ref_Code = 'NF' and ref_no = #{nfNo}
mapper.update: update newsfeed set status = 'N' where nf_no = #{nfNo}
mapper.insert: insert into reply ( reply_no , emp_no , ref_code , ref_no , reply_content , create_date , status , reply_origin_no , reply_branch ) values ( seq_reply.nextval , #{empNo} , 'NF' , #{refNo} , #{replyContent} , sysdate , 'Y' , 0 , 1 )
mapper.select: select reply_no , r.emp_no , emp_name , reply_content , create_date from reply r join employee e on e.emp_no = r.emp_no where ref_code = 'NF' and r.status = 'Y' and ref_no = #{nfNo}
